swahili: Mara tu utakapomaliza usajili wako, utakuwa na fursa ya kupata msomo yotr ya Mjasiriamali wa Kilimo ya BLF .
english: Once you complete the registration, you will have access to all of the BLF training materials.

swahili: Karibu ,Kwenye teknolojia ya chatbot ya mafunzo ya BLF. Ili kukupatia uzoefu bora, tunatamani  kuelewa mahitaji yako. Tafadhali jaza dodoso fupi la usajili.
english: Welcome the BLF's training chatbot. To provide you with the best experience, we would like to understand your needs. Please complete a brief registration survey.

swahili: Tafadhali andika jina lako lote kwa ukamilifu
english: Please type in your full name.
Thank you, #name, How old are you?

swahili: Nzuri! Shukrani kwa majibu yako. Ni jinsi  gani unayo?
english: Great! Thank you for your response. What is your gender?
In which region are you located?
